name: The Cosmic Collective
description:
♦   Description   ♦

You are the pilot of a rescue vessel in an asteroid field overrun by pirates! You must rally stranded civilian ships and guide them to safety! Obliterate asteroids, fight pirates and leverage civilian armaments to help you and your fleet reach the escape portal in one piece.

♦   Controls   ♦

  • [WASD] → Move Ship
  • [Q and E] → Rotate Ship
  • [Mouse] → Aim Turrets, Missiles
  • [Left Mouse] → Shoot Turrets, Missiles
  • [Escape] → Pause, Unpause

Music, sound effects and tutorials can all be disabled in the options menu.
